XIV.4.B.2.e
.
Contents of All FTI Folders or Secured FFR
Only letters or documents containing FTI should be stored in the orange light-weight folders or secured electronic folder in the FFR.  This includes due process letters and awards letters containing FTI.
Use the table below to determine the appropriate location to store documents containing FTI.
If …
Then store the information in the …
VA generates a letter containing FTI
orange light-weight folder, or
secured FFR.
evidence is received by the PMC or VSC, along with a returned VA generated letter containing FTI, or
a Veteran provides a copy of their tax return or an IRS form (
W2, Wage and Tax Statement
,
1099-R, Distributions From Pensions, Annuities, Retirement or Profit-Sharing Plans, IRAs, Insurance Contracts, etc.
, etc.)
unsecured folder.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section B - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match: Safeguarding
